body:
Features and Enhancements

Population Files
  • Added the ability to create and use population files in geography fields throughout the system.
    • The user can choose whether to share the population file with other users in the project, or keep it private.
    • The user can choose whether to expire the population file after 60 days or to keep it indefinitely.
    • Population files can be created by uploading a list of zips and employee_counts (csv, xlsx, txt) or by building from the geography options in the project.
    • Population files can be used geography fields throughout the system.
Adequacy
  • Improvements to user messages in Adequacy.
Confirmed Practicing
  • Updated bars and labels to highlight Confirmed Practicing.
